lines.text: [a two-headed man walks into Porky's office]
Boy, two-headed! This ought to be a sensational act!

[cleaning out the dustbin]
Act-schmact. I'm the janitor.
I am known as The Man with a Thousand Voices. Shall I do my stuff?
[the turtle proceeds to do many different voices, including Bugs Bunny, before stopping in exhaustion]
But that was only nine hundred and ninety-nine voices.
Shucks, I know I've got another one... well, I'll think of it.
